title: cant login in game
body: hi riot please help me... i cant log in ingame whenever i try i always get this message. "unabale to connect to the aunthentication service. and it will direct me to the riot webpage and do a couple of captcha checks for security but nothing happened. i repeat over and over again and still nothing happened please help me i want to play right now

replies.body:
It sounds like your firewall is potentially  blocking you from authenticating and connecting to the client. One thing that could be blocking that from happening is your firewall. Try going through [this step](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) on the connection guide and see if that helps first.

If you're still having issues getting through authentication, you might have to either switch to public DNS or flush your DNS, another step that can be found on the [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5). 

Those two steps, along with the rest of the connection guide, are a good start to troubleshooting what's going on when logging in. If you still run into issues, our Tech team can take a look at it when you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you need anything else! :)
